message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to offer $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that $900000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to be flexible. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1100000. This is the best I can do, but I'm confident it's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but $1100000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm willing to meet you at $980000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the fact that I've already been flexible with the price. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement here.
